memberdef.definition: typedef Eigen::Matrix< DependentVariableType, Eigen::Dynamic, 1 > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::DependentVector
memberdef.name: DependentVector

briefdescription.para: Typedef of the state and measurement vectors.

memberdef.definition: typedef Eigen::Matrix< DependentVariableType, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::DependentMatrix
memberdef.name: DependentMatrix

briefdescription.para: Typedef of the state and measurement matrices.

memberdef.definition: typedef std::function< DependentVector( const IndependentVariableType, const DependentVector& ) > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::Function
memberdef.name: Function

briefdescription.para: Typedef of the function describing the system and the measurements.

memberdef.definition: typedef std::function< DependentMatrix( const IndependentVariableType, const DependentVector& ) > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::MatrixFunction
memberdef.name: MatrixFunction

briefdescription.para: Typedefs for system and measurement matrix functions.
Typedef of the integrator settings.

memberdef.definition: typedef numerical_integrators::NumericalIntegrator< IndependentVariableType, DependentVector, DependentVector, IndependentVariableType > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::Integrator
memberdef.name: Integrator

briefdescription.para: Typedef of the integrator.
System function.

detaileddescription.para: System function that will be used to retrieve the a-priori estimated state for the next step.

briefdescription.para: Measurement function.

detaileddescription.para: Measurement function that will be used to retrieve the estimated measurement for the next step, based on the current state.

briefdescription.para: Matrix representing the uncertainty in system modeling.
Matrix representing the uncertainty in measurement modeling.
Scalar representing step-size for filtering process.
Scalar representing the initial time.
Scalar representing the current time.
Vector representing the a-posteriori estimated state.

detaileddescription.para: Vector representing the a-posteriori estimated state, i.e., the state after the prediction and update steps of the Kalman filter.

briefdescription.para: Matrix representing the a-posteriori estimated covariance.

detaileddescription.para: Matrix representing the a-posteriori estimated covariance, i.e., the covariance after the prediction and update steps of the Kalman filter.

briefdescription.para: Boolean specifying whether the state needs to be integrated.
Pointer to the integrator.

detaileddescription.para: Pointer to the integrator, which is used to propagate the state to the new time step.

briefdescription.para: Indentity matrix.

detaileddescription.para: Indentity matrix with the correct dimensions for the specific application.

memberdef.definition: std::map< IndependentVariableType, DependentVector > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::historyOfStateEstimates_
memberdef.name: historyOfStateEstimates_

briefdescription.para: Map of estimated states vectors history.

memberdef.definition: std::map< IndependentVariableType, DependentMatrix > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::historyOfCovarianceEstimates_
memberdef.name: historyOfCovarianceEstimates_

briefdescription.para: Map of estimated covariance matrices history.

memberdef.definition: std::vector< std::shared_ptr< statistics::RandomVariableGenerator< double > > > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::systemNoiseDistribution_
memberdef.name: systemNoiseDistribution_

briefdescription.para: Vector where the system noise generators are stored.

memberdef.definition: std::vector< std::shared_ptr< statistics::RandomVariableGenerator< double > > > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::measurementNoiseDistribution_
memberdef.name: measurementNoiseDistribution_

briefdescription.para: Vector where the measurement noise generators are stored.
Vector of system noise hisotries.
Vector of measurement noise hisotries.

memberdef.argsstring: (const DependentMatrix &systemUncertainty, const DependentMatrix &measurementUncertainty, const IndependentVariableType filteringStepSize, const IndependentVariableType initialTime, const DependentVector &initialStateVector, const DependentMatrix &initialCovarianceMatrix, const std::shared_ptr< IntegratorSettings > integratorSettings)
memberdef.name: FilterBase

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor.
systemUncertainty
Matrix defining the uncertainty in modeling of the system.
measurementUncertainty
Matrix defining the uncertainty in modeling of the measurements.
filteringStepSize
Scalar representing the value of the constant filtering time step.
initialTime
Scalar representing the value of the initial time.
initialStateVector
Vector representing the initial (estimated) state of the system. It is used as first a-priori estimate of the state vector.
initialCovarianceMatrix
Matrix representing the initial (estimated) covariance of the system. It is used as first a-priori estimate of the covariance matrix.
integratorSettings
Settings for the numerical integrator to be used to propagate state.

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Function to update the filter with the data from the new time step.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to update the filter with the data from the new time step. Note that this is a pure virtual function and as such has to be implemented in the derived classes.
currentMeasurementVector
Vector representing current measurement.

briefdescription.para: Function to produce system noise.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to produce system noise, based on a Gaussian distribution, with zero mean and standard deviation given by the diagonal elements of the input system uncertainty matrix.
Vector representing system noise.

briefdescription.para: Function to produce measurement noise.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to produce measurement noise, based on a Gaussian distribution, with zero mean and standard deviation given by the diagonal elements of the input measurement uncertainty matrix.
Vector representing measurement noise.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve step-size for filtering.
Function to retrieve initial time.
Function to retrieve current time.
Function to retrieve current state estimate.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve current state estimate. The state estimate needs to first be computed by updating the filter with the updateFilter function.
Current state estimate.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve current covariance estimate.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve current covariance estimate. The covariance estimate needs to first be computed by updating the filter with the updateFilter function.
Current state estimate.

memberdef.definition: std::map< IndependentVariableType, DependentVector > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::getEstimatedStateHistory
memberdef.name: getEstimatedStateHistory

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the history of estimated states.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the history of estimated states.
History of estimated states for each time step.

memberdef.definition: std::map< IndependentVariableType, DependentMatrix > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::getEstimatedCovarianceHistory
memberdef.name: getEstimatedCovarianceHistory

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the history of estimated covariance matrices.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the history of estimated covariance matrices.
History of estimated covariance matrices for each time step.

memberdef.definition: std::pair< std::vector< DependentVector >, std::vector< DependentVector > > tudat::filters::FilterBase< IndependentVariableType, DependentVariableType >::getNoiseHistory
memberdef.name: getNoiseHistory

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the history of system and measurement noise used by the updateFilter function.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the history of system and measurement noise.
History of system and measurement noise for each time step, output as a std::pair.

briefdescription.para: Function to modify the step size for filtering.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to modify the step size for filtering, without interrupting the filtering process.
newFilteringStepSize
Double denoting the new step size for filtering.

briefdescription.para: Function to modify the current time.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to modify the current time, without interrupting the filtering process.
newCurrentTime
Double denoting the new current time.

briefdescription.para: Function to update the a-posteriori estimates of state and covariance with external data.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to update the a-posteriori estimates of state and covariance with external data, without interrupting the filtering process.
newStateEstimate
Vector denoting the new a-posteriori state estimate.
newCovarianceEstimate
Matrix denoting the new a-posteriori covariance estimate.

briefdescription.para: Function to clear the history of stored variables.

detaileddescription.para: Function to clear the history of stored variables. This function should be called if the history of state and covariance estimates over time needs to be deleted. This may be useful in case the filter is run for very long times.

briefdescription.para: Function to revert to the previous time step.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to revert to the previous time step.
timeToBeRemoved
Double denoting the current time, i.e., the instant that has to be discarded.

briefdescription.para: Function to create the function that defines the system model.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to create the function that defines the system model. The output of this function is then bound to the systemFunction_ variable, via the std::bind command.
currentTime
Scalar representing the current time.
currentStateVector
Vector representing the current state.
Vector representing the estimated state.

briefdescription.para: Function to create the function that defines the measurement model.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to create the function that defines the measurement model. The output of this function is then bound to the measurementFunction_ variable, via the std::bind command.
currentTime
Scalar representing the current time.
currentStateVector
Vector representing the current state.
Vector representing the estimated measurement.

briefdescription.para: Function to predict the state for the next time step.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to predict the state for the next time step, with the either the use of the integrator provided in the integratorSettings, or the systemFunction_ input by the user.
Propagated state at the requested time.

memberdef.argsstring: (const DependentVector &aPrioriStateEstimate, const DependentVector &currentMeasurementVector, const DependentVector &measurementEstimate, const DependentMatrix &gainMatrix)
memberdef.name: correctState

briefdescription.para: Function to correct the state for the next time step.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to predict the state for the next time step, by overwriting previous state, with the either the use of the integrator provided in the integratorSettings, or the systemFunction_ input by the user.
aPrioriStateEstimate
Vector denoting the a-priori state estimate.
currentMeasurementVector
Vector denoting the external measurement.
measurementEstimate
Vector denoting the measurement estimate.
gainMatrix
Gain matrix, such as Kalman gain (for Kalman filters).

briefdescription.para: Function to correct the covariance for the next time step.

detaileddescription.para: Function to predict the state for the next time step, by overwriting previous state, with the either the use of the integrator provided in the integratorSettings, or the systemFunction_ input by the user.

briefdescription.para: Function to clear the history of stored variables for derived class-specific variables.

detaileddescription.para: Function to clear the history of stored variables for derived class-specific variables. This function can be overwritten in a derived class, to add other variables to the list of variables to be cleared.

briefdescription.para: Function to revert to the previous time step for derived class-specific variables.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to revert to the previous time step for derived class-specific variables. This function can be overwritten in a derived class, to add other variables to the list of elements to be reverted.
timeToBeRemoved
Double denoting the current time, i.e., the instant that has to be discarded.

briefdescription.para: Function to generate the noise distributions for both system and measurement modeling.

detaileddescription.para: Function to generate the noise distributions for both system and measurement modeling, which uses a Gaussian distribution, with zero mean and standard deviation given by the diagonal elements of the input system and measurement uncertainty matrices.

briefdescription.para: Function to generate the numerical integrator to be used for propagation of the state.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to generate the numerical integrator to be used for propagation of the state, based on the integrator settings and the systemFunction_ input by the user. The systemFunction_ therefore acts as the differential equation for the system.
integratorSettings
Pointer to integration settings.

briefdescription.para: Filter class.

detaileddescription.para:
Base class for the set up and use of filters.
IndependentVariableType
Type of independent variable. Default is double.
DependentVariableType
Type of dependent variable. Default is double.
